TopicTitle: need a mod that'll make eva easier

Articles.Content:
I want a mod to make my mission targets visible from eva or from craft, and I want a compass/navball in eva. In a perfect world, I'd also like a real-time indicator of what biome I'm currently in...

anybody got a mod that'll do me?

thanks!

-OpticBoom

Welcome aboard! 

This is more of a question for General Add-on Affairs, moving. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thank you, and I offer my newbish apology for requiring assistance with my newbish request.

-OpticBoom

> 
> Welcome aboard! 
> This is more of a question for General Add-on Affairs, moving. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
No worries. I think [NavHUD](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81543) works in EVA for your navball needs (and is quite handy in regular flight, too).

>I want a mod to make my mission targets visible from eva or from craft

[Waypoint Manager](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104758)

>and I want a compass/navball in eva

NavHUD, as mentioned above.

> In a perfect world, I'd also like a real-time indicator of what biome I'm currently in...

[VOID](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/54533) or [Kerbal Engineer](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/18230). For Kerbal Engineer, be sure to turn on "partless" mode.
